HotkeyScript.name: PauseBot
HotkeyScript.script:
local cavebot = getsetting("Cavebot/Enabled") local targeting = getsetting("Targeting/Enabled")
if cavebot == 'no' or targeting == 'no' then setcavebot('on') settargeting('on') setlooting('on') else setcavebot('off') settargeting('off') setlooting('off') end wait(500)

PersistentScript.name: Refiller_ib
Auto_Ultimate_Area_Spell_Specia
PersistentScript.script:
auto(100, 150) --[[ Name: Auto Ultimate Area Spell by BlakW Version: v1.0.0 Status: Works TODO: ]]--
--Minimum monsters count to consider: local minMonsterCount = 5
--Distance from self: local selfDistance = 3
--Name Spell One to cast: local nameSpellOne = ("exevo gran mas frigo")
--Name of Creatures to consider: local nameMonstersTohit = {"Insectoid Worker", "Waspoid", "Crawler", "Spitter", "Kollos", "Spidris"}
--Do not cast if player seen before (1000 = 1 second): local secondsPlayerOnScreen = 5000
--Cast spell if creature HP % is less than: local creatureMinHpToAoe = 30
if (serverType == ("PVP")) then
if ((paroundfloor(10, 15) == 0) and (($timems-$playerlastseen) >= secondsPlayerOnScreen) and (maround_ib(selfDistance, unpack(nameMonstersTohit)) >= minMonsterCount) and (cancastspell(nameSpellOne) == true) and ($mp > 100) and ($attacked.id ~= 0) and ($attacked.hppc <= creatureMinHpToAoe)) --if ((paround(10, true) == 0) and (lasttimeplayeronscreen >= secondsPlayerOnScreen) and (maround(selfDistance, unpack(nameMonstersTohit)) >= minMonsterCount) and (cancast(nameSpellOne) == true) and (mp > 100) and (target.id ~= 0) and (mHH <= creatureMinHpToAoe) and (mA >= minMonsterCount)) then cast(nameSpellOne) end elseif (serverType == ("OPT-PVP")) then
if ((maround_ib(selfDistance, unpack(nameMonstersTohit)) >= minMonsterCount) and (cancastspell(nameSpellOne) == true) and ($mp > 100) and ($attacked.id ~= 0) and ($attacked.hppc <= creatureMinHpToAoe)) --if ((maround(selfDistance, unpack(nameMonstersTohit)) >= minMonsterCount) and (cancast(nameSpellOne) == true) and (mp > 100) and (target.id ~= 0) and (mHH <= creatureMinHpToAoe) and (mA >= minMonsterCount)) then cast(nameSpellOne) end end

PersistentScript.name: Auto_Haste
PersistentScript.script:
auto(800, 1000) --[[ Name: Auto Haste by BlakW Version: v1.0.0 Status: Works TODO: ]]--
--Name haste spell: local hasteSpellName = ("utani gran hur")
--Consider monsters: local hasteConsiderMonsters = ("no")
--Monsters amount to haste: local hasteMonstersAmount = 3
if (($pzone == false) and ($hasted == false) and ($standtime < 3000) and ($lootbodies == 0)) then if (hasteConsiderMonsters == ("yes")) then if (maround_ib(7) >= hasteMonstersAmount) then cast(hasteSpellName) wait(1800) end elseif (hasteConsiderMonsters == ("no")) then cast(hasteSpellName) wait(1800) end end

PersistentScript.name: Kill_Around_If_Trapped
PersistentScript.script:
auto(800, 1000) --[[ Name: Kill Around If Trapped by BlakW Version: v1.0.0 Status: Works TODO: ]]--
--Minimum monsters count to consider: local minMonsterCount = 1
--Distance from self: local selfDistance = 1
--Name Spell One to cast: local nameSpellOne = ("exevo gran mas frigo")
--Standtime Limit (1000 = 1 second): local standtimeLimit = 60000
--Do not cast if player seen before (1000 = 1 second): local secondsPlayerOnScreen = 5000
if (serverType == ("PVP")) then
if ((paroundfloor(10, 15) == 0) and (($timems-$playerlastseen) >= secondsPlayerOnScreen) and (maround_ib(selfDistance) >= minMonsterCount) and (cancastspell(nameSpellOne) == true) and ($mp > 100) and ($standtime > standtimeLimit)) then cast(nameSpellOne) end elseif (serverType == ("OPT-PVP")) then
if ((maround_ib(selfDistance) >= minMonsterCount) and (cancastspell(nameSpellOne) == true) and ($mp > 100) and ($standtime > standtimeLimit)) then cast(nameSpellOne) end end

PersistentScript.name: Escape_Traps_Monsters_Around
Soft_Boots_Changer
PersistentScript.script:
auto(800, 1000) --[[ Name: Soft Boots Changer by BlakW Version: v1.0.0 Status: Works TODO: ]]--
--Name of boots to use apart from soft: local idBootsToUse = nameBootsToUse
--Unequip soft boots at % health: local hpPctUnequipSb = 99
--Unequip soft boots at % mana: local mpPctUnequipSb = 99
--Equip soft boots at % health or less: local hpPctEquipSb = 98
--Equip soft boots at % mana or less: local mpPctEquipSb = 98
--Soft Boots name: local idSoftBoots = ("Soft Boots")
--Soft Boots in use ID: local idUseSoftBoots = 3549
--Worn Soft Boots name: local idWornSoftBoots = ("Worn Soft Boots")
if ($pzone == true) then moveitems(idBootsToUse, "boots", mainBp, 1) wait(1000) elseif ($pzone == false) then if (($hppc <= hpPctEquipSb) and ($mppc <= mpPctEquipSb) and ($feet.id ~= idUseSoftBoots) and ($lootbodies == 0)) then moveitems(idSoftBoots, "boots", mainBp, 1) wait(1000) elseif (($hppc >= hpPctUnequipSb) and ($mppc >= mpPctUnequipSb) and ($feet.id == idUseSoftBoots) and ($lootbodies == 0)) then moveitems(idBootsToUse, "boots", mainBp, 1) wait(1000) end end if (($feet.id == itemid(idWornSoftBoots)) and ($lootbodies == 0)) then moveitems(idBootsToUse, "boots", mainBp, 1) wait(1000) end

PersistentScript.name: Auto_Safe_Reconnect
PersistentScript.script:
auto(4000, 6000) --[[ Name: Auto Safe Reconnect by BlakW Version: v6.0.0 ]]--
--Temple NPCs: local templeNpcNames = {"Alia", "Tyrias", "Brewster", "Rahkem", "Kasmir", "Amanda", "Isimov", "Yberius", "Maealil", "Quentin", "Lynda", "Lorietta", "Prezil", "Kjesse", "Asralius"}

--Reconnect Engine: if (useAutoReconnect == ("yes")) then if ($connected == false and $dead == false) then reconnect() wait(600, 1800) pausewalking(10000)
if (($pzone == true) and (maround_ib(7, false, unpack(templeNpcNames)) >= 1) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32787, 31276, 7, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32595, 32744, 6, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(33213, 32454, 1, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32213, 31133, 7, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(33004, 31490, 11, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32649, 31925, 11, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(33217, 31814, 8, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32317, 32826, 7, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(33194, 32853, 8, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32369, 32241, 7, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32360, 31782, 7, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32957, 32076, 7, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(32732, 31634, 7, templePositionRange)) or ($pzone == true) and (islocationxyz_ib(33447, 31323, 9, templePositionRange))) then wait(1500) closeclient() wait(1500) messagebox("Reconnect Message: Tibia client has been closed because character was inside a temple. This is to protect your character from being killed by other players.") end
wait(10000, 15000) setcavebot("yes") wait(2000, 2500) setlooting("yes") wait(1000, 2500) settargeting("yes") wait(2000, 3500)
end end

PersistentScript.name: Safe_Bank
PersistentScript.script:
auto(800, 1000) --[[ Name: Safe Bank by BlakW Version: v1.0.0 Status: Works TODO: ]]--
foreach newmessage msgs "NPCs" do if msgs.text:find("There is not enough gold on your account.") then setcavebot("off") settargeting("off") setsetting("Alerts/Disconnected/PlaySound", "no") setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/Auto Safe Reconnect/Enabled", "no") wait(5000,10000) closeclient() end end

PersistentScript.name: Anti_Red_Skull
PersistentScript.script:
auto(800, 1000) --[[ Name: Anti Red Skull by BlakW Version: v2.0.0 Status: Works TODO: ]]--
-- Close At Murder Engine
if useCloseAtMurder == ("yes") then
foreach message msgs "Server Log" do if msgs.text:find("Warning! The murder of .+ was not justified.") then setcavebot("off") settargeting("off") setsetting("Alerts/Disconnected/PlaySound", "no") setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/Auto Safe Reconnect/Enabled", "no") wait(2000,5000) closeclient() end end end
-- Pause At Pzlock Engine
if pauseAtPzlock == ("yes") then if ($pvpsigned == true) and (serverType == ("PVP")) then setcavebot('off') settargeting('off') setlooting('off') wait(15000, 20000) if getsetting("Cavebot/Enabled") == ("no") then setcavebot('on') end if getsetting("Targeting/Enabled") == ("no") then settargeting('on') end if getsetting("Looting/Enabled") == ("no") then setlooting('on') end end end
-- Anti Face Player Engine
if antiFacePlayer == ("yes") and serverType == ("PVP") then if paround(1) >= 1 and iscreatureontile($posx-1, $posy, $posz) then turn("n") elseif paround(1) >= 1 and iscreatureontile($posx+1, $posy, $posz) then turn("s") elseif paround(1) >= 1 and iscreatureontile($posx, $posy-1, $posz) then turn("w") elseif paround(1) >= 1 and iscreatureontile($posx, $posy+1, $posz) then turn("e") end end

PersistentScript.name: Auto_Backup_Healer_Mage
PersistentScript.script:
auto(200, 200) --[[ Name: Auto Extra Healer Mage by BlakW Version: v1.0.0 Status: Works TODO: ]]--
--This action is just for users who suffer from Healer not responding, if you never experienced this than there is not need to enable this action. --Before enabling this ensure that all Healer Rules are the same as default. If any is missing it wont work properly.
---- Healing Spells ---- if (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/Exura-Vita/Enabled") == "yes") then if ($hppc > 0 and $hppc <= 55) and ($mppc >= 1 and $mppc <= 100) then cast("exura vita") end elseif (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/Exura-Vita/Enabled") == "no") then --do nothing end
if (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/Exura-Gran/Enabled") == "yes") then if ($hppc > 55 and $hppc <= 75) and ($mppc >= 1 and $mppc <= 100) and (cancastspell("exura gran") == true) then cast("exura gran") end elseif (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/Exura-Gran/Enabled") == "no") then --do nothing end
if (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/Exura/Enabled") == "yes") then if ($hppc > 75 and $hppc <= 92) and ($mppc >= 1 and $mppc <= 100) and (cancastspell("exura") == true) then cast("exura") end elseif (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/Exura/Enabled") == "no") then --do nothing end
---- Anti Paralyze Spells ---- if (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/Low-Anti-Paralyze/Enabled") == "yes") then if ($hppc > 0 and $hppc <= 55) and ($mppc >= 1 and $mppc <= 100) and (cancastspell("exura vita") == true) and ($paralyzed == true) then cast("exura vita") end elseif (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/Low-Anti-Paralyze/Enabled") == "no") then --do nothing end
if (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/Mid-Anti-Paralyze/Enabled") == "yes") then if ($hppc > 55 and $hppc <= 75) and ($mppc >= 1 and $mppc <= 100) and (cancastspell("exura gran") == true) and ($paralyzed == true) then cast("exura gran") end elseif (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/Mid-Anti-Paralyze/Enabled") == "no") then --do nothing end
if (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/high-Anti-Paralyze/Enabled") == "yes") then if ($hppc > 75 and $hppc <= 100) and ($mppc >= 1 and $mppc <= 100) and (cancastspell("exura") == true) and ($paralyzed == true) then cast("exura") end elseif (getsettings_ib("Settings/Healer/Rules/high-Anti-Paralyze/Enabled") == "no") then --do nothing end
---- Potions ---- if ($mppc >= 0 and $mppc <= 60) and (itemcount(nameManaPot, 'all') >= 1) then useoncreature(nameManaPot, $name) wait(1000, 1500) end

--Prismatic Amulet Engine: if (usePrismaticNecklaces == ("yes")) then if (itemcount(nameNecklace, 'all') >= 1) then if (maround_ib(7, false, "Lizard High Guard", "Lizard Zaogun", "Lizard Legionnaire") >= amountPrismaticAmulet) then if ($neck.id ~= itemid(nameNecklace)) then moveitems(nameNecklace, "amulet", prismaticBp, 1) end elseif (maround_ib(7, false, "Lizard High Guard", "Lizard Zaogun", "Lizard Legionnaire") < amountPrismaticAmulet) then if ($neck.id == itemid(nameNecklace)) then moveitems(nameNecklace, prismaticBp, "amulet", 1) end end end end
--Pristmatic Ring Engine: if (usePrismaticRings == ("yes")) then if (itemcount(nameRing, 'all') >= 1) then if (maround_ib(7, false, "Lizard High Guard", "Lizard Zaogun", "Lizard Legionnaire") >= amountPrismaticRing) then if ($finger.id ~= itemid(nameRing)) then moveitems(nameRing, "amulet", prismaticBp, 1) end elseif (maround_ib(7, false, "Lizard High Guard", "Lizard Zaogun", "Lizard Legionnaire") < amountPrismaticRing) then if ($finger.id == itemid(nameRing)) then moveitems(nameRing, prismaticBp, "amulet", 1) end end end end

Waypoint.label: openReqBps
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:
setsetting("Persistent/Scripts/Auto Reopen Backpacks/Enabled", "no")
setsetting("Looting/OpenNextBP", "no") closewindows() wait(2000)
if (useMainBp == ("yes")) then openitem(mainBp, "back") wait(1500, 2000) resizewindows() end
wait(1500, 2000)
if (useLootBp == ("yes")) then openitem(lootBp, mainBp, true) wait(1500, 2000) resizewindows() end
wait(1500, 2000)
if (useSupBp == ("yes")) then openitem(supBp, mainBp, true) wait(1500, 2000) resizewindows() end
wait(1500, 2000) resizewindows() wait(1000)

Waypoint.label: ItemDepositor
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:
reachgrounditem("depot")wait(1000,2000)opendepot()wait(700,900)while (windowcount_ib(mainDpBp) == 0)do openitem(mainDpBp, "Depot Chest") wait(700,900)end
wait(1500, 2000)
--Deposit Jewelled Backpacks: lastonto = 0 local specialItems = specialItemsToDeposit local _nextiii = true for i,j in pairs(specialItems) do _nextiii = true while itemcount(specialItems[i], 'all') > 0 and _nextiii do _nextiii = moveitemsonto(specialItems[i], nonStackDpBp, lastonto, nil, "all", 100) wait(400,500) end end ---------------
--Stack Items to Deposit: local getStackItemsToDeposit = stackItemsToDeposit
--Non-Stack Items to Deposit: local getNonStackItemsToDeposit = nonStackItemsToDeposit
--Number of Loot Backpacks to open: local getAmountLootBackpacks = AmountLootBackpacks
--Engine: for i = 1, getAmountLootBackpacks do depotdeposit_ib(stackDpBp, unpack(getStackItemsToDeposit)) wait(1000, 1500) depotdeposit_ib(nonStackDpBp, unpack(getNonStackItemsToDeposit)) wait(1000, 1500) openitem(lootBp, lootBp, false) wait(1500, 2000) end

Waypoint.label: withdrawNecklaces
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:
if (usePristmaticNecklaces == ("yes")) then reachgrounditem("depot") wait(1000,2000) openitem("depot") wait(700,900)
while (windowcount_ib("Depot Chest") == 0) do openitem(3502, "locker") wait(700,900) end
wait(1500, 2000)
while (windowcount_ib(prismaticDpBp) == 0) do openitem(prismaticDpBp, "Depot Chest") wait(700,900) end
wait(1500, 2000)
if (getcontainer_ib(prismaticDpBp).usedslots > 1) then while (itemcount(nameNecklace, prismaticBp) < maxNecklace) do moveitems(nameNecklace, prismaticBp, prismaticDpBp, 1) wait(1000) if (getcontainer_ib(prismaticDpBp).usedslots == 1) then openitem(prismaticDpBp, prismaticDpBp, false) wait(1500, 2000) end moveitems(nameNecklace, prismaticBp, prismaticDpBp, 1) wait(1000) end elseif (getcontainer_ib(prismaticDpBp).usedslots == 1) then openitem(prismaticDpBp, prismaticDpBp, false) wait(1500, 2000) while (itemcount(nameNecklace, prismaticBp) < maxNecklace) do moveitems(nameNecklace, prismaticBp, prismaticDpBp, 1) wait(1000) if (getcontainer_ib(prismaticDpBp).usedslots == 1) then openitem(prismaticDpBp, prismaticDpBp, false) wait(1500, 2000) end moveitems(nameNecklace, prismaticBp, prismaticDpBp, 1) wait(1000) end end end

Waypoint.label: depositWithdrawCash
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:
local totalMPotToCalc = (maxManaPot) local nameMPotToCalc = (nameManaPot) local priceMPotToCalc = (priceManaPot) local totalRuneToCalc = (maxRune) local nameRuneToCalc = (nameRune) local priceRuneToCalc = (priceRune) local totalRuneToCalc2 = (maxRune2) local nameRuneToCalc2 = (nameRune2) local priceRuneToCalc2 = (priceRune2) local nameItemToCalc = ("worn soft boots") local priceItemToCalc = 10000 local countItemToCalc = itemcount(nameItemToCalc, 'all') local countMPotToCalc = itemcount(nameMPotToCalc, 'all') local countRuneToCalc = itemcount(nameRuneToCalc, 'all') local countRuneToCalc2 = itemcount(nameRuneToCalc2, 'all')
local totalToWithdraw = positive((totalMPotToCalc-countMPotToCalc)*priceMPotToCalc) + positive((totalRuneToCalc-countRuneToCalc)*priceRuneToCalc) + positive((totalRuneToCalc2-countRuneToCalc2)*priceRuneToCalc2) + positive(countItemToCalc*priceItemToCalc) + (extraCash)
if (getcreature("Eighty").dist <= 3)
then
say("hi")
wait(1500,2500)
npcsay("deposit all")
wait(200,300)
npcsay("yes")
wait(200,300)
if (totalToWithdraw > 0)
then
npcsay("withdraw "..totalToWithdraw)
wait(200,300)
npcsay("yes")
wait(200,300)
end
npcsay("balance")
wait(200,300)
end
if (((itemcount("gold coin", 'all')) + (itemcount("platinum coin", 'all')*100) + (itemcount("crystal coin", 'all')*10000)) < totalToWithdraw)
then
gotolabel("go_withdraw")
local amountToSave = 16 local transferTo = $worldname say("hi") wait(1000,1600) npcsay("deposit all") wait(110,150) npcsay("yes") wait(1100,1500) npcsay("balance") wait(1100,1500) if $balance > amountToSave then npcsay(string.format("transfer %d to Win %s", math.max(0, $balance - amountToSave), transferTo)) wait(110,150) npcsay("yes") wait(130,160) npcsay('withdraw 16') wait(110,150) npcsay("yes") end
end

Waypoint.script:

--Name of runes to buy: local nameRuneToBuy = (nameRune)
--Total amount of runes to buy: local totalRuneToBuy = (maxRune)
--Name of secondary runes to buy: local nameRuneToBuy2 = (nameRune2)
--Total amount of secondary runes to buy: local totalRuneToBuy2 = (maxRune2)
--Name of mana potions to buy: local nameMpToBuy = (nameManaPot)
--Total amount of mana potions to buy: local totalMpToBuy = (maxManaPot)
setsetting("Looting/OpenNextBP", "no") wait(1000) if (getcreature("Rock In A Hard Place").dist <= 3) then say("hi") wait(2000) while ((itemcount(285, 'all') + itemcount(284, 'all') + itemcount(283, 'all')) >= 10) do npcsay("vials") wait(1000, 1200) npcsay("yes") wait(1000, 1200) end wait(1000, 1200) npcsay("magic stuff") wait(1000, 1200) buyitemsupto(nameRuneToBuy, totalRuneToBuy) wait(1000, 1200) buyitemsupto(nameRuneToBuy2, totalRuneToBuy2) wait(1000, 1200) buyitemsupto(nameMpToBuy, totalMpToBuy) wait(1000, 1200) npcsay("bye") wait(1000, 1200) end

Waypoint.label: moveSup
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:
--Name of runes to move: local nameRuneToMove = (nameRune)
--Name of secondary runes to move: local nameRuneToMove2 = (nameRune2)
--Name of mana potions to move: local nameMpToMove = (nameManaPot)
--Name of backpack that have all potions to move: local from = (mainBp)
--Name of backpack to move all potions into: local to = (supBp)
local moveLimitRune = 20 local moveTimesRune = 0 while ((itemcount(nameRuneToMove, mainBp) > 1) and (moveTimesRune <= moveLimitRune)) do moveitems(nameRuneToMove, to, from, 100) wait(1000) moveTimesRune = moveTimesRune + 1 end
local moveLimitRune2 = 20 local moveTimesRune2 = 0 while ((itemcount(nameRuneToMove2, mainBp) > 1) and (moveTimesRune2 <= moveLimitRune2)) do moveitems(nameRuneToMove2, to, from, 100) wait(1000) moveTimesRune2 = moveTimesRune2 + 1 end
local moveLimitMp = 20 local moveTimesMp = 0 while ((itemcount(nameMpToMove, mainBp) > 1) and (moveTimesMp <= moveLimitMp)) do moveitems(nameMpToMove, to, from, 100) wait(1000) moveTimesMp = moveTimesMp + 1 end wait(1000) setsetting("Looting/OpenNextBP", "yes") wait(1000)

Waypoint.label: checkSelling
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:
if(sellProducts == ("yes") or sellEquipment == ("yes")) then gotolabel("sell_loot") else gotolabel("after_selling_loot") end

then

Waypoint.label: disableReopenBpsPre
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:

Waypoint.label: checkIfProducts
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:
if(sellProducts == ("yes")) then gotolabel("sellProductsL") else gotolabel("checkIfEquipment") end

Waypoint.label: sellProductsL
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:
local ITEMS = {"Spidris Mandible", "Kollos Shell", "Compound Eye", "Swarmer Antenna", "Dung Ball", "Waspoid Claw", "Waspoid Wing", "Crawler Head Plating", "Spitter Nose"}
reachcreature("Rock In A Hard Place")
wait(1000)
if (getcreature("Rock In A Hard Place").dist <= 3)
then
say("hi")
wait(2000)
npcsay("creature products")
for i = 1, #ITEMS
do
sellitems(ITEMS[i], 100)
wait(400,700)
end
end

Waypoint.label: checkIfEquipment
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:
if(sellEquipment == ("yes"))
then
gotolabel("sellEquipmentL")
else
gotolabel("after_selling_loot")
end

Waypoint.label: sellEquipmentL
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:
local ITEMS = {"Carapace Shield", "Grasshopper Legs", "Hive Scythe", "Calopteryx Cape"}
reachcreature("Rock In A Hard Place")
wait(1000)
if (getcreature("Rock In A Hard Place").dist <= 3)
then
say("hi")
wait(2000)
npcsay("local equipment")
for i = 1, #ITEMS
do
sellitems(ITEMS[i], 100)
wait(400,700)
end
end

Waypoint.label: getMission
Waypoint.script:
-- // Do not edit anything below:
if (getcreature("Orockle").dist <= 3) then say("hi") wait(1500,2500) npcsay("report") wait(1200,1300) npcsay("kill") wait(1200,1300) npcsay("yes") wait(1200,1300) npcsay("mission") wait(1200,1300) npcsay("kill") wait(1200,1300) npcsay("yes") wait(1200,1300) npcsay("rewards") wait(1200,1300) npcsay("yes") wait(1200,1300) end
